name: Evacuate the Dauntless
description:
Your airship has been breached  by demons and is going to drop out of the sky at any moment. The crew are dead or already evacuated. Luckily you were already mounted up in your mechsuit with a full load of ammo! All you need to do now is get to the Mechsuit drop bay and Evacuate the Dauntless.

This is a student project for Trimester 1 of the Diploma of Game Design GAD170 unit at SAE Institute.

Please see in game credits for the full list of third party assets used and for instructions on how to play. Controller only!
